p: We faced a number of deaths that seemed to be higher than what could be expected from the data of the Chinese epidemic, where a fatality rate on hospitalised patients ranging from 1.4 to 2.3% ( Guan et al., 2020, Wu et al., 2020, Wu et al., 2020) to 28% was documented in an early report from Wuhan by Zhou et al. (2020).
